name: Togekiss
flavorText:
It will never appear where there
is strife. Its sightings have
become rare recently.

previous.name: Magmortar
previous.flavorText:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600
degrees F from the ends of its
arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

next.name: Yanmega
next.flavorText:
By churning its wings, it creates
shock waves that inflict critical
internal injuries to foes.

pokemon.name: Togepi
pokemon.flavorText:
The shell seems to
be filled with
joy. It is said that it will share
good luck when
treated kindly.

pokemon.name: Togetic
pokemon.flavorText:
They say that it
will appear before
kindhearted, car­ ing people and
shower them with
happiness.
